name: Serpentarius
description:
Serpentarius, master of the forgotten 13th aspect of the zodiac, has conquered the Zodiac Temple, but you are relatively powerless to defeat him.

However, you have heard that you can be granted additional powers by praying at the altars in the Elemental Temples.

With an aspect from each element, you may enter the Zodiac Temple to confront and defeat the evil serpent-bearer once and for all!

Features 12 unique abilities, each representative of the 12 zodiac signs. At any given time, you may have 1-4 of these "aspects" that make up your character build.

Approach the elemental temples in whichever order you prefer to build your character.

[ARROWS] or [WASD] to move. [1-4] to switch aspects. [?] for help.

This game was made for the 2017 7-Day Roguelike Challenge (7DRL).
